text: Mashrafi Hossain Antu, known as Mashrafi Antu (born: 10 October, 2001) is a Bangladeshi actor, journalist and writer. He known for Pirates: The Blood Secret (2010) and Show Me Where You Live (2017). == Publications == * Ghure Elam Sylhet; Lufe Nilam Sundorjo. == References == == External links == * Mashrafi Antu on IMDb * Mashrafi Antu on LinkedIn
title: Mashrafi Antu
